2.1.7.1.2. solrclient.SOLRArrayResponseIterator¶

class solrclient.SOLRArrayResponseIterator(client, q, fq=None, pagesize=100, cols=['lng', 'lat'])¶

Returns an interator that operates on a SOLR result set. The output for each document is a list of values for the columns specified in the cols parameter of the constructor.

__init__(client, q, fq=None, pagesize=100, cols=['lng', 'lat'])¶

Methods

next()
processRow(row) Override this method in derived classes to reformat the row response
